question: Which Strategic nation-building initiative is launched by NITI Aayog?
explanation: Mentor India is a strategic nation building voluntary initiative launched by NITI aayog, to engage leaders who can guide and mentor students in 5000+ Atal Tinkering Labs that Atal Innovation Mission has established/is in the process of establishing across India. The idea is to engage leaders who will nurture and guide students in the Atal Tinkering Labs.
